Curtis Miller
Curtis has a MS in Computer Science and has been developing software for the past 10 years. He’s worked with large, distributed systems for the US Navy, behavioral health EHR systems and large-scale CMS. He found his true passion developing web applications using the Ruby programming language and hasn’t looked back since.
